exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="radiobutton_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="radiobutton_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="radiobutton_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="radiobutton_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="button_up_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0x000000" textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" height="24" size="20" />
	<e:Label id="promptDisplay" verticalCenter="0" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor="0xa9a9a9" width="100%" height="24" size="20" touchEnabled="false" includeIn="normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect alpha="0.5" y="0" x="0" width="750" height="1334"/>
	<e:Group id="group_over" alpha="1" x="105" y="209" visible="false">
		<e:Rect id="rect_over" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" width="540" height="770" y="0" x="0" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20"/>
		<e:Image id="img_gameOverResult" y="70" x="57" source="end_civilian_sucess"/>
		<e:Group id="group_goldNum" width="200" y="215" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:Image source="end_gold" horizontalCenter="-42" verticalCenter="1"/>
			<e:Label id="lb_goldNum" text="金币+0" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0xFF9C00" size="32" verticalCenter="1" horizontalCenter="39"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Label id="lb_civilianWord" text="平民用词：" y="332" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体" bold="true"/>
		<e:Group id="group_civilian" height="60" width="400" y="380" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="img_fenge" source="end_fenge" y="467" horizontalCenter="0.5"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_undercover" text="卧底用词：" y="498" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Group id="group_undercover" height="60" width="428" y="552" horizontalCenter="0">
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="group_btn" width="539" horizontalCenter="0.5" y="642" height="94">
			<e:Image id="img_btn_closeOverPage" source="end_sure" horizontalCenter="0" y="0"/>
			<e:Label id="lb_gameOverCutDown" text="确定（10s）" size="32" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体" touchEnabled="false" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_myWord" height="511" width="550" alpha="1" x="100" y="412" visible="false">
		<e:Rect ellipseHeight="30" ellipseWidth="30" fillColor="0xFCFCFC" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_Word" text="给我分配的词语" y="100" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体" size="36"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_myWord" text="水饺" y="186" horizontalCenter="0" size="60" textColor="0xF0545E" fontFamily="黑体"/>
		<e:Image id="img_btn_myWord" source="end_sure" y="316" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_myWordCutDown" text="(确定10s)" y="349" fontFamily="黑体" size="32" textColor="0x292929" horizontalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_resetVote" x="107" y="123" width="487" alpha="1" visible="false">
		<e:Rect fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" width="487" x="0" height="365" y="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_resetVote" x="53" y="29" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x000000" width="387" size="38"/>
		<e:Image id="img_btn_resetVote" source="end_sure" x="99" y="216"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_voteTime" text="确定（5s）" y="248" horizontalCenter="0.5" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="黑体" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_nextSpeak" height="365" width="487" x="129" y="536" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" fillColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_nextGameWord" text="标签" y="77" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0.5" textAlign="center" size="36"/>
		<e:Image id="img_btn_nextGame" source="end_sure" y="226" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_nextGameTime" text="开始下一轮发言" y="259" fontFamily="黑体" touchEnabled="false" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="-1.5" textAlign="center"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="MainUISkin" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
	<e:Group id="group_main_word" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Label id="lb_youWord" text="你的词语" x="30" size="34" fontFamily="黑体" alpha="0.6" textAlign="left" y="10" textColor="0x292929"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_undercoverAndCivilian" text="0卧底/0平民" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体" alpha="0.6" textAlign="right" right="30" y="10"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_personItem" y="70" width="700" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:layout>
			<e:TileLayout orientation="rows" horizontalAlign="left" horizontalGap="20" verticalGap="20"/>
		</e:layout>
		<e:Group id="group_item_1" height="340" width="220" x="-233" y="269" alpha="1">
			<e:Group left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
				<e:Rect fillColor="0x000000" alpha="0.2" width="220" x="0" height="340" y="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" x="0" y="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="-213" width="220" y="289" height="340" id="group_item_2">
			<e:Group right="0" bottom="0" left="0" top="0" x="10" y="10">
				<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="220" height="340" alpha="0.2" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" y="0" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="-203" width="220" y="299" height="340" id="group_item_3">
			<e:Group right="0" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" y="20" x="20">
				<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="220" height="340" alpha="0.2" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" y="0" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="-193" width="220" y="309" height="340" id="group_item_4">
			<e:Group bottom="0" left="0" top="0" right="0" y="30" x="30">
				<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="220" height="340" alpha="0.2" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" y="0" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group x="-183" width="220" y="319" height="340" id="group_item_5">
			<e:Group right="0" left="0" top="0" bottom="0" y="40" x="40">
				<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="220" height="340" alpha="0.2" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" y="0" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="group_item_6" x="-173" width="220" y="329" height="340">
			<e:Group bottom="0" left="0" top="0" right="0" y="50" x="50">
				<e:Rect y="0" fillColor="0x000000" width="220" height="340" alpha="0.2" x="0"/>
				<e:Image source="tempImg" y="0" x="0"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="lb_type" text="标签" x="334" y="10" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="黑体" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group id="group_groupControll" y="800" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Label id="lb_title" y="0" size="42" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x292929" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_des" y="54" textColor="0x5A5A5A" fontFamily="黑体" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="img_btn_overSpeak" source="home_over" y="192" x="90" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="img_an_speak" source="c_1" x="250" y="109" visible="false"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_ac" y="149" horizontalCenter="0" x="10" touchEnabled="true" enabled="true" visible="false">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="home_canSpeack" source.down="anxia_speak" source.disabled="anxia_speak"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_loading" height="210" width="250" alpha="0" y="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Rect ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" alpha="0.5" width="250" height="210" y="0" x="0"/>
		<e:Image id="img_loading" source="loading_png" anchorOffsetX="31" anchorOffsetY="31" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_btn_ready" y="900" width="750" x="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image id="img_btn_canReady" source="home_notReady" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_ready" text="准备(20s)" fontFamily="黑体" textAlign="center" touchEnabled="false" verticalCenter="-1" horizontalCenter="0" size="42"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="MainLoading" width="750" height="1334" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" />
    <e:Label y="993" textColor="0x040404" text="当前版本：0.0.1" fontFamily="黑体" horizontalCenter="0.5" id="lb_version"
             x="10" />
    <e:Group width="200" y="63" height="200" horizontalCenter="0">
        <e:Image source="first_icon" verticalCenter="0" cacheAsBitmap="false" touchEnabled="false"
                 fillMode="repeat" horizontalCenter="0"  scale9Grid="5,5,120,120"/>
        <e:Rect right="0" ellipseHeight="60" left="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" top="0" ellipseWidth="60" bottom="0"
                fillAlpha="0" strokeWeight="10" strokeAlpha="1" strokeColor="0xFFFFFF" />
    </e:Group>
    <e:Label id="lblText" text="0%" y="719" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0xAD98FB" size="60" />
    <e:Label y="299" textColor="0xAD98FB" text="谁是卧底" fontFamily="黑体" size="30" id="lblText0" horizontalCenter="0" />
    <e:Image id="img_btn_fastPlay" source="first_fastPiPei" x="245" y="825"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LookInfoSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="15e5176eb6c"/>
	<e:Rect id="rect_btn_close" alpha="0" fillColor="0x000000" y="0" x="2" width="750" height="1334"/>
	<e:Group id="grop_total" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" x="0" y="-1">
		<e:Rect height="410" width="590" y="0" fillColor="0xFFFFFF" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20" strokeColor="0x38B4FC" strokeWeight="2" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Rect id="img_btn_rect" height="68" width="74" x="512" y="3" fillColor="0xFFFFFF"/>
		<e:Image id="img_btn_close" source="lf_close" y="20" right="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Group id="group_img" height="140" width="140" y="40" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Group y="200" left="0" right="0">
			<e:Label id="lb_playName" text="小白" y="34" fontFamily="黑体" textColor="0x000000" horizontalCenter="0"/>
			<e:Image id="img_sex" x="258" y="2" source="lf_man"/>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="10"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group y="240" left="0" right="0">
			<e:Group id="group_age" x="-314" y="230">
				<e:Image source="lf_age" x="777" y="241"/>
				<e:Label id="lb_age" text="0岁" x="-263" y="199" size="26" textColor="0x292929" fontFamily="黑体"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="8" horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group id="group_name" y="240" x="-304">
				<e:layout>
					<e:HorizontalLayout gap="8" horizontalAlign="center"/>
				</e:layout>
				<e:Image y="251" x="787" source="lf_pos"/>
				<e:Label id="lb_pos" y="209" textColor="0x292929" text="北京" fontFamily="黑体" size="26" x="-253"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" gap="50" verticalAlign="middle"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group y="300" left="0" right="0">
			<e:Group x="-320" y="331">
				<e:Rect id="rect_btn_sendGift" height="70" width="160" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xFD5596" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20"/>
				<e:Label id="lb_gift" text="送礼物" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" fontFamily="黑体" size="28" touchEnabled="false"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group y="341" x="-310">
				<e:Rect id="rect_btn_addFriend" width="160" y="0" height="70" x="0" fillColor="0x13D082" ellipseHeight="20" ellipseWidth="20"/>
				<e:Label id="lb_add" text="加好友" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" size="28" fontFamily="黑体"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:Group y="351" x="-300">
				<e:Rect id="rect_btn_lookInfo" width="160" y="0" height="70" x="0" fillColor="0xFEC103" ellipseWidth="20" ellipseHeight="20"/>
				<e:Label id="lb_lookInfo" text="查看详情" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" touchEnabled="false" fontFamily="黑体"/>
			</e:Group>
			<e:layout>
				<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" gap="30"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PersonItemSkin" width="220" height="340" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" fillColor="0xC0EDFA" strokeColor="0xF71111" strokeAlpha="0"/>
	<e:Group id="grop_playerHead" height="221" y="0" left="0" right="0">
		<e:Image id="img_personImg" height="220" width="220" x="0" y="0" source="notImg"/>
		<e:Image id="img_personIndex" x="0" y="8" source="home_index1"/>
		<e:Image id="img_personSpeack" x="147" y="150" source="s_1" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="lb_personName" text="小白" y="230" size="28" textColor="0x292929" horizontalCenter="0" fontFamily="黑体"/>
	<e:Group id="group_voteListPerson" height="49" y="274" left="0" right="0" visible="false">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout horizontalAlign="left" paddingLeft="5"/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="img_btn_vote" source="home_voteBg" x="40" y="270" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group id="group_reayed" y="284" left="0" right="0" visible="false">
		<e:Image source="home_ready" horizontalCenter="-39" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_readyed" text="已准备" fontFamily="黑体" size="26" textColor="0x00A714" x="95" y="-1"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_voteResult" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" visible="false">
		<e:Rect left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" alpha="0.5"/>
		<e:Image id="img_voteResult" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="home_civilian"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_offLine" height="220" y="1" left="0" right="0" visible="false">
